meanings.definition: Excessively careful or diligent in one's actions or duties.
meanings.sent1: She was so overconscientious about her work that she double-checked every detail multiple times.
meanings.sent2: Being overconscientious, he spent hours perfecting his presentation to ensure it was flawless.
meanings.sent3: Her overconscientious nature led her to color-code her sock drawer for fun.
meanings.sent4: His overconscientious approach to gardening turned his backyard into a meticulously planned paradise.
meanings.sent5: The overconscientious student never missed a deadline, earning praise for her dedication.

meanings.definition: Showing an excessive concern for doing things correctly or perfectly.
meanings.sent1: The overconscientious chef refused to serve any dish that wasn't cooked to perfection.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her overconscientious attention to detail, making sure everything was just right.
meanings.sent3: His overconscientious attitude towards folding laundry made his friends laugh at his precision.
meanings.sent4: The overconscientious painter meticulously blended colors to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Being overconscientious, he couldn't rest until every task was completed flawlessly.
